programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Strap in to watch your favorite trucks and drivers compete with racing action from Florida Citrus Bowl, on January 28, 2006.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam fans packed out the HHH Metrodome for the freestyle action on December 3, 2005.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam Stadium Championship Series West kicks off in Oracle Park for the first time in seventeen years. Colt Stephens begins defense of his World Finals Freestyle Championship while Ryan and Adam Anderson compete on the same series for the first time since 2021. It’s Grave Digger vs Son Uva Digger in San Francisco.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam's 2014 season continues with fun racing action from the Georgia Dome on January 10, 2014.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam races into the Astrodome in Houston, Texas during the 2000 season of Monster Jam.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East continues its tear through the sunshine state as Tyler Menninga attempts to drive Grave Digger to back-to-back event championships. Meanwhile, Tristan England is undefeated on the Ray-J racetrack and looks to pilot JCB Digatron to a perfect racing record as Monster Jam continues in Tampa.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: It's the last regular season Monster Jam in Minneapolis! Tonight, ten drivers compete with their freestyle skills.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: All the racing and freestyle action from Cowboys Stadium, on February 27, 2010.

programme.title: Monster Jam TV
programme.desc: The Mercedes-Benz Superdome hosts Monster Jam as the 2012 tour visits New Orleans, LA.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East rolls into upstate New York as Tyler Menninga attempts to clinch his second straight series title, while JCB Digatron’s Tristan England and Megalodon’s Todd LeDuc attempt to block Grave Digger from the series win.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Don't miss the thrilling Monster Jam racing action from Gillette Stadium on June 20, 2015!

programme.title: Arena in 30
programme.desc: Arena Championship Series Central takes moves into the Ford Center in downtown Evansville, Indiana for the series finale featuring the return of Monster Jam legend, Jon Zimmer Sr. in Wild Side. Grave Digger’s Brandon Vinson looks to end the season with another championship before competing at World Finals XXII in Nashville.

programme.title: World Finals
programme.sub-title: World Finals XX - Camping World Stadium - Orlando, FL - Speedsters
programme.desc: The Monster Jam Speedsters hit the track for the first Obstacle Course Challenge of the weekend during Monster Jam World Finals XX (20), direct from Camping World Stadium in Orlando, Florida.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam is back with all the action from Atlanta, GA at the sold-out Georgia Dome on January 12, 2008.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam’s 2022 season continues with round 1 of the Stadium Championship Series at Ring Central Coliseum in Oakland, CA.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series Red heads south to Florida for Round 8. Bakugan Dragonoid’s Camden Murphy has the series points lead and tries to keep Grave Digger’s Adam Anderson from continuing his climb back to the top in Tampa. While Megalodon’s Todd LeDuc attempts to win his second straight Overall Event Championship.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: It's the debut of Adam Anderson in the Taz Machine - get ready for exciting racing action from the HHH Metrodome, on December 3, 2005.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam's 2022 season continues with round 22 of the Stadium Championship Series, at Carrier Dome, in Syracuse, NY

programme.desc: Don't miss your favorite trucks and drivers compete with freestyle action from St. Louis, MO, on February 16, 2008.

programme.sub-title: University of Phoenix Stadium - Glendale, AZ
programme.desc: Will Max D continue to hold the lead for Monster Jam's West Championship Series?

programme.title: Monster Jam TV
programme.desc: Monster Jam's 2014 season zooms into Ford Field in Detroit, MI with more fun!

programme.title: World Finals
programme.sub-title: World Finals VII - Sam Boyd Stadium - Las Vegas, NV - Freestyle
programme.desc: Don't miss exciting freestyle action from Monster Jam World Finals 7 on March 25, 2006.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Levi's Stadium is soaked from the rain and creates a rather difficult track for the drivers to play on. Watch as the Jammer's skills are put to the test!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: The Monster Jam 2021 Stadium Championship Series continues at Lucas Oil Stadium in Indianapolis, IN.

programme.title: World Finals
programme.sub-title: World Finals XVII - Sam Boyd Stadium - Las Vegas, NV - Freestyle 1
programme.desc: Watch the exciting first half of the Monster Jam freestyle action from World Finals XVII on March 25, 2016 at Sam Boyd Stadium.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: The fun doesn't stop as Monster Jam continues in New Orleans- this time with freestyle action that just won't quit!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: The Dome at America's Center - St. Louis, MO
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series Red takes over the Dome at America’s Center. Can Grave Digger’s Adam Anderson hang on to the series points lead? Will Tom Meents celebrate 20 years of Maximum Destruction with a win close to home? Find out when Monster Jam heads to St. Louis, Missouri for Round 3.

programme.title: Arena in 30
programme.sub-title: Simmons Bank Arena - Little Rock, AR
programme.desc: Earth Shaker’s Tristan England brings the Arena Championship Series West points lead to Little Rock, Arkansas where he will challenge El Toro Loco’s Elvis Lainez, Grave Digger’s Krysten Anderson and the rest of the west lineup in an epic battle for the overall event championship.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Everything's bigger in Texas- the freestyle Monster Jam action from Houston, TX, on January 6, 2007, is gonna be huge!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam kicks off its 2018 season at Camping World Stadium in Orlando, Florida.
